name: Eli Lilly tokenized stock (xStock)
description: Eli Lilly xStock (LLYx) is a tracker certificate issued as Solana SPL and ERC-20 tokens. LLYx tracks the price of Eli Lilly and Company (the underlying). LLYx is designed to give eligible cryptocurrency market participants regulatory-compliant access to the stock price of Eli Lilly and Company, whilst maintaining the benefits of blockchain technology. Eli Lilly and Company is a global pharmaceutical company based in Indianapolis, Indiana, that discovers, develops, manufactures, and markets human healthcare products.
